workflow.description: Transcoder based on Avisynth, x262, x264, x265 and FFMpeg, developed by Steinar Apalnes, implemented by Francesco Bucciantini, Livio Aloja and an Open Source Community

nodes.name: Avisynth_in_SD SPR
nodes.description: Avisynth_in per i file SD Sport Node1

nodes.name: Limiter Tv Range v2
nodes.description: Brings luma and chroma in Tv Range 0.7mV 16-235.

properties.script:
# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\ResizeKAR.avsi")


c=Converttoyv16(m_clip)
#resized=ResizeKAR(c, 1920, 1080, "Spline64Resize")
resized=c
m_clip=Limiter(resized, min_luma=16, max_luma=235, min_chroma=16, max_chroma=240)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip

# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#

r=ResampleAudio(m_clip, 48000)
n=Normalize(r, 0.22)
m_clip=ConvertAudioTo24bit(n)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip

nodes.name: IMX 50
nodes.description: x262 to encode in MPEG-2 4:2:2 planar yv16 720x576 25i TFF Limited BT601

nodes.name: Limiter Tv Range v2
nodes.description: Brings luma and chroma in Tv Range 0.7mV 16-235.

properties.script:
# Variables:
#
# m_clip		= The last returned AviSynth media
#
# Do NOT change any of the following variables!!!
# _ffas_video 	= <original video>
# _ffas_audio	= <original audio>
# _ffas_height	= <source height>
# _ffas_width	= <source width>
# _m_clip_a_channels = <total channels>
# _ffas_work_fdr	= Working folder for the workflow
#
Import("\\MIBCSAVS001\AvisynthServer\encoder\encoder\Processors\avs_plugins\ResizeKAR.avsi")


c=Converttoyv16(m_clip)
#resized=ResizeKAR(c, 1920, 1080, "Spline64Resize")
resized=c
m_clip=Limiter(resized, min_luma=16, max_luma=235, min_chroma=16, max_chroma=240)

# The following MUST be the last line of your script
Return m_clip
